you will need to boot into single user mode and fix it by adding your user back to the admin group. Still curious how you did this

reboot into recovery mode, that will give you a root prompt, run this command "adduser tuzlo admin", then run "passwd" and choose a password for the root user. Then you can later login as root if you want.
